verses.verse: I exhort <S%G3870><s%> <S%G5719><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, that, first <S%G4412><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%>, supplications <S%G1162><s%>, prayers <S%G4335><s%>, intercessions <S%G1783><s%>, and giving of thanks <S%G2169><s%>, be made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5745><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>;

For <S%G5228><s%> kings <S%G935><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> that are <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> authority <S%G5247><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> we may lead <S%G1236><s%> <S%G5725><s%> a quiet <S%G2263><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peaceable <S%G2272><s%> life <S%G979><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honesty <S%G4587><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is good <S%G2570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> acceptable <S%G587><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%>;

Who <S%G3739><s%> will have <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%> to be saved <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5683><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5629><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> there is one <S%G1520><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> mediator <S%G3316><s%> between 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, the man <S%G444><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>;

Who <S%G3588><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5631><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> a ransom <S%G487><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, to be testified <S%G3142><s%> in due <S%G2398><s%> time <S%G2540><s%>.

Whereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am ordained <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5681><s%> a preacher <S%G2783><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> an emissary <S%G652><s%>, (I speak <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, and lie <S%G5574><s%> <S%G5736><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>;) a teacher <S%G1320><s%> of the goyim <S%G1484><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> verity <S%G225><s%>.

I will <S%G1014><s%> <S%G5736><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that men <S%G435><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> <S%G5738><s%> every <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3956><s%> where <S%G5117><s%>, lifting up <S%G1869><s%> <S%G5723><s%> holy <S%G3741><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>, without <S%G5565><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> doubting <S%G1261><s%>.

In like manner <S%G5615><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, that women <S%G1135><s%> adorn <S%G2885><s%> <S%G5721><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> modest <S%G2887><s%> apparel <S%G2689><s%>, with <S%G3326><s%> shamefacedness <S%G127><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sobriety <S%G4997><s%>; not <S%G3361><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> broided hair <S%G4117><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> gold <S%G5557><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> pearls <S%G3135><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> costly <S%G4185><s%> array <S%G2441><s%>;

But <S%G235><s%> (which <S%G3739><s%> becometh <S%G4241><s%> <S%G5719><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> professing <S%G1861><s%> <S%G5740><s%> godliness <S%G2317><s%>) with <S%G1223><s%> good <S%G18><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>.
Let <S%G3129><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> <S%G5720><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> silence <S%G2271><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> subjection <S%G5292><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I suffer <S%G2010><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, nor <S%G3761><s%> to usurp authority <S%G831><s%> <S%G5721><s%> over the man <S%G435><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> silence <S%G2271><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> Adam <S%G76><s%> was <S%G4111><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> formed <S%G4111><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, then <S%G1534><s%> Havah <S%G2096><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Adam <S%G76><s%> was <S%G538><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> deceived <S%G538><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> being deceived <S%G538><s%> <S%G5685><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the transgression <S%G3847><s%>.

Notwithstanding <S%G1161><s%> she shall be saved <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5701><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> childbearing <S%G5042><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> they continue <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5661><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> charity <S%G26><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> holiness <S%G38><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> sobriety <S%G4997><s%>.
